sample_docs: +1 408 766 7503 See3CAM_30Z10X - 10x Optical Zoom USB 3.0 Camera See3CAM_30Z10X is a 3 MP Autofocus USB Camera with Optical Zoom based on a 1/3" rolling shutter, color CMOS image sensor. This USB Zoom camera houses a full-functional ISP and supports YUV422 output image format. This camera supports 10x Optical Zoom and 6x Digital Zoom. This See3CAM_30Z10X - USB Zoom Camera is UVC-compliant SuperSpeed USB 3.0 Camera and does not require any special camera drivers. This Optical Zoom USB Camera is an ideal for customer applications in devices such as PCB inspection camera, Growth Monitoring, Article Inspection, Defect Detection, etc., where the 10x optical zoom capability can be leveraged. The See3CAM_30Z10X product is of high quality and a perfect fit for our needs. We are extremely happy with the finest service. Read More.. - Pradeep V Pydah, Maxerience Electrosystems USB 3.0 camera with Optical Zoom of 10x and Digital Zoom of 6x USB 3.0 – YUV422 USB 2.0 - MJPEG USB 3.0 – YUV422 USB 2.0 - MJPEG Plug-&-Play (UVC compliant - No drivers required)and Backward compatibility with USB2.0 hosts with limited features and capabilities Resolutions YUV422 HD (720p) 60fps Full HD (1080p) 30fps Resolutions MJPG VGA 30fps QVGA 30fps HD (720p) 30fps Supported OS - Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Linux * USB 3.0 device with USB 3.0 Micro-B connector. Our Standard camera board will have USB 3.0 Micro-B connector. Operating Voltage : 5V Temperature Range - 0° C to 40° C Power requirements - Powered by dual USB 3.0 Y cable Size in mm (l x b x h) - 45 x 81 x 59.5 Unique ID for each camera * - Linux support available only for USB 3.0 Sensor : 1/3" format CMOS image sensor Focus Type : Auto Focus Resolution : 3.15 MP Pixel size : 2.2μm x 2.2μm Sensor Active Area : 2304(H) x 1536(V) pixels Responsivity : 2.0V/Lux-sec (@550nm) SNR : 36 dB Dynamic Range : 69.5 dB Output Format : USB 3.0: YUV422 USB 2.0: MJPG Shutter type : Electronic Rolling shutter ISP : External ISP Zoom Magnification : Optical: 10x Digital: 6x Focal Length : 6.3mm(Wide) ~ 63mm (Tele) +/- 5% Field of View (estimated) : Wide: 46.6° (H); 34.58° (V); 56.36° (D) Zoom/Focus Mechanism : Stepper motor (with microstepping) Iris Mechanism : Stepper motor (with microstepping) Supported OS - Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Linux support available only for USB 3.0 Windows Application features - eCAMView (Part of SDK) DirectShow Compliant application Support for Zoom (10x), Auto Exposure Control (AEC), Auto white balance (AWB) and Autofocus (AF) Burst still capture up to 8 images supported Support for Zoom (10x), Auto Exposure Control (AEC), Auto white balance (AWB) and Autofocus (AF) Burst still capture up to 8 images supported Brightness Contrast Shutter Speed Focus (Continuous, Single and Manual) Zoom (Optical and Digital) White Balance (Manual, Automatic) Auto Exposure Control Orientation (Normal, Flip, Mirror, Flip & Mirror) Scene Mode (Normal and Macro) Focus (Continuous, Single and Manual) Zoom (Optical and Digital) White Balance (Manual, Automatic) Orientation (Normal, Flip, Mirror, Flip & Mirror) Scene Mode (Normal and Macro) Please contact sales@e-consystems.com for any customization requirements. The See3CAM_30Z10X camera supports 10x Optical Zoom and 6x Digital Zoom. The Optical Zoom is implemented through the stepper motor inside the camera. The Zoom (both Optical and Digital) can be controlled from the host PC using the APIs provided by e-con Systems™. Customers who own platforms that support SuperSpeed USB 3.0 and are interested in evaluating the 3.0 MP USB Zoom camera can directly buy the See3CAM_30Z10X from e-con Systems™. In addition to See3CAM_30Z10X, the evaluation kit comes with e-CAMView - Windows sample application for video preview and still capture along with the UVC Extension features (for Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 & Linux *) and support for 4 weeks. For all enquiries please write to sales@e-consystems.com See3CAM_30Z10X - 3 MP USB 3.0 Zoom Camera Dual USB 3.0 Y Cable See3CAM_30Z10X - 3 MP USB 3.0 Zoom Camera Dual USB 3.0 Y Cable Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Linux * e-CAMView (Windows) - Video Preview and Still Capture Application Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Linux * e-CAMView (Windows) - Video Preview and Still Capture Application See3CAM_30Z10X - Hardware and Software documents * - Linux support available only for USB 3.0 Do you want a smaller form factor? x +1 408 766 7503 Contact Us Login / Register See3CAM_CU20 - Full HD WDR HDR USB 3.1 Camera Tags: HDR Cameras | Enclosure Cameras Highlights Houses e-CAM20_CU0230_MOD - Full HD onsemi® AR0230AT Image Sensor Fixed Focus Rolling shutter with global reset mode # High Dynamic Range (HDR) On-board high performance ISP SAMPLE PRICE USD 149 Excluding Shipment Charges Documents Overview specifications Software Documents Order Samples Videos Customization Overview See3CAM_CU20 is a Full HD HDR USB camera board with ultra-Lowlight performance. It has an ability to stream seamlessly at wide temperature range (-40°C to 85°C). This Full HD USB 3.1 Gen 1 (5Gb/Sec.) camera is based on 1/2.7" AR0230AT CMOS digital image sensor with a pixel size of 3.0 μm x 3.0 μm from onsemi@reg;. It has S-mount (M12) lens holder which allows customers to choose and use the lens according to their requirement. It is a Plug-and-Play camera (UVC compliant) for Windows, Linux. This HDR camera is also backward compatible with USB 2.0 host ports. See3CAM_CU20 has a dedicated, high-performance Image Signal Processor chip (ISP) on board, that performs all the Auto functions (Auto White Balance, Auto Exposure control). The ISP and sensor settings have been fine tuned to generate best-in-class video in uncompressed UYVY. Recently we have launched an enclosure for this camera. This aluminium enclosure ensures the safety even at the most challenging conditions. It is FCC and CE compliance camera. Refer Datasheet for more details. Specifications Key features: Frame Rate: Streams HD @ 45 fps , Full HD @ 30 fps & VGA @ 60fps Refer Datasheet for complete frame rate details. Output format: Uncompressed UYVY Supported OS: Windows, Linux, Android* and MAC** 10 pin and 5 pin GPIO header (Only for without enclosure) External Hardware Trigger Input (Only for without enclosure) Sensor Strobe output to connect external flash Unique ID for each camera Lightweight, versatile, and portable two-board solution Interface: Interface:USB 3.1 Gen 1 device Connector: Micro-B interface connector UVC complaint - no additional drivers required Backward compatible with USB 2.0 hosts Module features: Sensor: AR0230AT from onsemi® Focus Type: Fixed focus Sensor Resolution: Full HD Chroma: Color Shutter Type: Electronic Rolling Shutter with global reset mode # Optical Format: 1/2.7" Output Format: Uncompressed UYVY Pixel Size: 3.0μm x 3.0μm pixel Sensor Active Area: 1928(H) x 1088(V) Array Size:1928 x 1088 pixel Responsivity: 4.0 V/lux-sec SNR: 41 dB Dynamic Range: Max upto 96 dB FOV: 128.99°(D), 110.95°(H), 60.62°(V) (with the lens provided by e-con) Electrical and Mechanical: Operating Voltage: 5V +/- 5% Operating Temperature Range: -40°C to 85°C Power Requirements: Max : 2.07W, Min: 1.59W Size in mm (l x b x h): Without Enclosure: Without Lens: 30 x 30 x 30.2 mm With Enclosure: Without Lens: 35.3 x 35.3 x 29 mm Board Weight: Without Enclosure: Without Lens: 13 Grams With Lens: 19 Grams With Enclosure: Without Lens: 57 Grams With Lens: 63 Grams Miscellaneous: Compliance: FCC, RoHS Launched on : * - Customers interested to work on Android would require e-con SDK ( Webeecam ). The specs mentioned above shall not be the same for Android **- For MAC OS support, please contact camerasolutions@e-consystems.com # - Rolling shutter is supported in the default firmware. Customized firmware/hardware is required to use a rolling shutter with Global reset mode. Software Supported OS - Windows 10/8.1, Linux, Android * and MAC ** Sample Application: eCAMView - Windows Camera application for Video Preview and Still Capture. QtCAM - Linux Camera application for Video Preview and Still Capture. Ready to Deploy Vision IP Cores For all your Imaging Needs TintE - ISP IP Core Vision Aggregator IP Core Vision Bridging IP Core Vision Multiplier IP Core TintE - ISP IP Core Vision Aggregator IP Core Vision Bridging IP Core Vision Multiplier IP Core TintE™ ISP, developed by e-con Systems®, is an FPGA-based ISP that offers a complete and customizable pipeline with essential features like debayering, AWB, and gamma correction. Adaptable to various FPGA platforms, TintE ensures superior image quality for modern imaging needs. Flexible - Select the IP Cores that fit your specific application needs. Customizable - Works with any sensor Portable - Easily deploy into any FPGA Know More Combine data streams from up to 16 cameras into a single, high-performance Interface output, ideal for 360° Surround View, ADAS, and other applications. Overcome video interface limitations with ease. Flexible Interface Options with up to 4 lanes at 2.5 Gbps per lane Ultra-Low Latency for real-time performance Simplified Design with an integrated arbiter module Know More Ensures seamless connectivity, supporting high-performance data transfer across multiple standards like PCI Gen3/Gen4, MIPI 2.5Gbps, high-speed LVDS. With configurable options, these cores enable smooth integration into existing FPGA or SoC designs, reducing design time and complexity. Seamless Data Transfer Across Multiple Interfaces High-Performance Data Transfer Seamless FPGA/SoC Integration Configurable and Customizable IP Blocks Know More Enables the simultaneous use of a single video feed across multiple outputs, mimicking a multi-camera setup and allowing for monitoring on various devices or screens.
